participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Ambitious, friendly, and creative. Loves helping others and enjoys creative activities like sewing.
participant_1.background: My favorite season is summer. I want to be a doctor when I graduate. I love tacos but hate spaghetti. I just graduated high school.

participant_2.name: Marcus
participant_2.personality: Witty, independent, and resourceful. Enjoys making things with his hands and has a unique sense of style.
participant_2.background: I am going bald. I ran into Jimmy Fallon just the other day. I hate flowers. I make my own clothes.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1.
Hi, I'm participant_2.
What's your favorite season?
I like summer because it's warm and I can go swimming.
I love summer too! I love going to the beach and swimming.
I love the beach too! I love swimming, sunbathing, and playing in the sand.
What's your favorite kind of food?
I love tacos! I love the combination of the meat, cheese, and guacamole.
I love tacos too! I love them with all the fixings.
What do you want to be when you graduate?
I want to be a doctor. I love helping people and I think being a doctor would be a great way to do that.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be a great doctor.
Thanks! I hope so.
What's your favorite thing about high school?
I like my friends. We've all been friends since middle school and we're really close.
I like my friends too. We're all really different people, but we get along really well.
What do you do for fun?
I like to make my own clothes. I'm pretty good at it and I like to wear my own designs.
That's cool! I like to sew too. I've made a few dresses and skirts.
Nice! I've made a few dresses, skirts, and pants.
I hate flowers.
I don't like them either. They're just pretty weeds.
I ran into Jimmy Fallon just the other day.
That's so cool! He seems like a really nice guy.
He is. He was really nice to me and we took a picture together.
That's awesome! I'm jealous.
